alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:24AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Scott, northeastern Polk, southwestern Yell and northwestern Montgomery Counties through NOON CDT... At 1123 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mena, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mena... Cardiff... Mena Intermountain Airport... Muddy Creek WMA... Acorn... Board Camp... Olio... Cedar Creek... Nunley... Ink... Y City... Nola... Needmore... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Harvey... Boles... Parks... Union Hill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
